meta.title: Japanese Kanji Generator - Create Random Kanji Images
meta.description: A tool that automatically generates Japanese kanji characters. Randomly create one character and download it as a 512 x 512px jpg or png image.
meta.keywords: kanji generator, kanji creation, kanji image, Japanese, random kanji
